author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower wall installation tip…old homes typically have thicker walls. This is problematic at the shower. One solution is wet shimming. I apply ALL-SET to the studs then install my backer board. This helps the shower wall stay plumb and even with the adjacent walls 👍🏽🔥#showerwall #showerrenovation #kerdiboard #schluter
title: Shower Wall Installation Tip - #shorts #homerepairtutor
